title: Tong Lei
text:
Tong Lei (; born 16 December 1997 in <a href="Quzhou">Quzhou</a>) is a <a href="Chinese%20people">Chinese</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player who currently plays for <a href="Chinese%20Super%20League">Chinese Super League</a> side <a href="Dalian%20Professional%20F.C.">Dalian Professional</a>.
Club career.
Tong Lei started his professional football career in 2016 when he was promoted to <a href="Hangzhou%20Greentown">Hangzhou Greentown</a>'s first squad. On 15 May 2016, he made his debut for Hangzhou in the <a href="2016%20Chinese%20Super%20League">2016 Chinese Super League</a> against <a href="Liaoning%20Whowin">Liaoning Whowin</a>, coming on as a substitute for <a href="Cheng%20Mouyi">Cheng Mouyi</a> in the 74th minute. Despite the club facing relegation at the end of the season, Tong was given the opportunity to gain more playing time and he would gradually start to establish himself as a regular with the squad and was part of the team that narrowly missed out on promotion at the end of the <a href="2019%20China%20League%20One">2019 China League One</a> season. 
On 7 February 2020 Tong Lei joined top tier club <a href="Dalian%20Professional%20F.C.">Dalian Pro</a> along with <a href="Wu%20Wei%20%28footballer%2C%20born%201997%29">Wu Wei</a> and <a href="Xue%20Qinghao">Xue Qinghao</a> on the same day. He would make his debut in a league game against <a href="Shandong%20Taishan%20F.C.">Shandong Taishan F.C.</a> on 26 July 2020 in a 3-2 defeat. 
Career statistics.
"Statistics accurate as of match played 31 December 2020."
